r.s: PHP extension for interfacing with memcached via libmemcached library
r.d: This extension uses libmemcached library to provide API for communicating with memcached servers.
r.n: - First stable release. - Add getResultMessage() method. - Fix OPT_RECV_TIMEOUT definition. - Initialize Session lock wait to max execution time (if max execution time is unlimited, default to 30 seconds).
